participant_1.background:
I moved to be closer to the love of my life.
My appearance is not my priority, I care more about things that interest me.
I think my golden retriever puppy is the cutest thing ever.
I am trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly.
i read three books a week.

participant_2.background:
I checked my pulse multiple times a day to make sure I'm not dying.
I spend my days reading, playing, and eating ice cream with my friends and partner.
I don't have any siblings, but I've been doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues.
i am slightly overweight , but my doctors say i m healthy.
I remember buying my first baseball card when I was 8 years old.

content.text: Hey there, how is your day going?
Pretty good, thanks for asking! I'm about to go out and play some baseball with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love baseball.
Me too! I've been playing since I was a kid.
Do you have a favorite team?
I'm a huge fan of the New York Yankees.
Nice! I'm a fan of the Boston Red Sox.
Haha, yeah, it is a little bit of a rivalry.
Well, at least we can agree that baseball is a great sport!
Definitely! I love watching it and playing it.
Me too! I wish I could play more often, but I don't have a lot of time.
I know what you mean. I'm always busy with work and other commitments.
Yeah, it's hard to find time to do the things you love.
Well, at least we have baseball to keep us going!
